While home at the old Maximal Base, Quickstride and Rat Trap see it wise to=
 keep an eye on what is happening outside the base, while keeping things ca=
sual amongst themselves.  Rat Trap looks up at the sky, and notices the min=
ions hanging about, yet he does not make any moves against them.

" I'll su=
re be glad when we get these creeps off our backs."

Quick Stride plucks at=
 a few blades of grass and swallows a mouth full.

" I hear ya."

While eat=
ing he spots a pair of headlights, and a sizeable silver truck, with black =
bumpers, looking a lot like the Autobot he had just helped to rescue recent=
ly.  He nudges Rat Trap.

"What? What is it?"

Quick Stride points to the t=
ruck with his nose.

" Over there, coming toward us. That truck, it looks f=
amilliar."

Rat Trap spots Tucson Prime heading toward them.  His little ja=
w drops.

" Holy Primus, I was right!  I was right! Hah, it's Wheels!  And =
wow!  Has he changed!"

Quick Stride and Rat Trap get into their robot mode=
s and jump around happilly.  Tucson Prime sees their reception while approa=
ching.  As he gets close enough to them he transforms into robot mode and l=
ooks to them.  Rat Trap walks up to him with a smile and tears actually wel=
ling up in his eyes.

" Wow, look at ya.  Ya sure made a change for the bes=
t.. Er, Tucson Prime."

Tucson smiles.

"I like the other name better."

Ra=
t Trap looks up.

"Um, Tucson?"

Tucson chuckles.

"No, the other one."

Ra=
t Trap smiles.

"Wheels?"

Tucson nodds.

"Yeah, that one."

Rat Trap quick=
ly goes up to his friend, as they exchange an embrace.

"It's great ta see =
ya again Wheels.  And contrats on your promotion."

Tucson's expression doe=
s not change.  His smile as gentile as that of a common Autobot.

"Thank yo=
u.  First I have to live up to my new status.  And I wouldn't have been abl=
e to do that if you hadn't rescued me like you did."

Rat Trap was in his g=
lory.

"Aww, what are friends for?  Okay, so, what brings ya here?  And, yo=
u're lookn' ta me now.."

Tucson kneels down to Rat Trap.

" First, When I =
got transformed, the energy managed to repair the damage to my optics.  Sec=
ond, I came here to talk to Nightstrike."

Rat Trap points to the base.

"O=
h, um, ya better check in with the guys in the base first.  Although, it's =
kinda obivous that you're one of us..  More so now."

Tucson chuckles again=
, and walks up toward the base.

" Legacy, this is Tucson Prime reporting b=
ack to the Maximal Base.  I wish to talk to Nightstrike, if at all possible=
. Please inform Lord Perseus of my pressense, it's important that I convers=
e with him also."

urprises."

n into the base.

 were on, however
